name: Pong Particles
description:
Once, an old man told me that the simplest things are the most effective. In the end you will understand the meaning.

I decided to make a pong game!
Boring... you'll be thinking. I guess you're right. Pong isn't this big game that people would like to play day and night.

So how can i make pong, a good game, again? Here's the point.

I think you've already understand, but i haven't told you something :)

You can also control the ball movement:
w/↑ Ball will go up
s/↓ Ball will go down
And if you don't do nothing, ball will go straight

The goal of the game is clear, is a pong after all!

Pick a friend and play together! if you can't, don't worry, just select the CPUmode from the option ^^

If you want to contact me: @dadezana on instagram

if you want to help, just leave a comment! ^^

PS: it's recommended to play in full screen mode
